full_summary:
**Enterprise Transformations - Temporary Help Services Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses**
==============================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   Reference Number: PW-22-01015846
*   Solicitation Number: 10075904
*   Publication Date: December 6, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: December 20, 2022 (14:00:00)
*   Tenders Status: Expiré

**Scope of Work**
----------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) requires temporary help services to support its operations. The procurement objective is to select a  supplier that can provide the necessary support services to meet the agency's needs.

The procurement strategy targets Indigenous suppliers, and the following streams and categories are of particular interest:

*   5.1 - Computer Application Support (Senior)
*   13.5 - Program Administration (Senior)
*   13.9 - Special Advisor (Senior)
*   13.6 - Risk Management (Senior)

**Tender Documents**
--------------------

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal, can be found on the Canada Buys website at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/06/fd6ba147676ac4ea53ec3e5eb4df98a7/10075904_-_npp.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/06/b1731ee2280cac5a628da848589be110/10075904_-_apm.pdf (French)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries or questions related to this tender opportunity, please contact Emilie Charbonneau at:

*   Email: emilie.charbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Phone: [not provided] 
*   Fax: [not provided]
*   Address: [not provided]

**Best Regards**
----------------

We look forward to receiving your proposal. Please note that this tender opportunity has expired.
